info.name: Gallery
info.summary: Explore, show and share your image collections
info.description:
Media gallery that adds image viewing capabilities to files view and public links. Provides a dedicated grid-based album view for images.
**Features**
- Support for a large selection of image types (depending on server setup) - Fullscreen, zoomable image view integrated with the Files app - Slideshow - Sort images by name or date - Per album description and copyright statement - Image download straight from the slideshow or the album view - Seamlessly jump between the gallery and files view - Ignore folders containing a ".nomedia" file - Native SVG support - Mobile support
